name: di-cic-front
description: User interface for the Claimed Identity Collector (CIC) part of the Identity Proofing and Verification (IPV) system within the GDS digital identity platform, GOV.UK Sign In.

scripts.build: yarn build-sass && yarn build-js && yarn copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/stylesheets/application.css --style compressed
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/javascripts/*.js dist/public/scripts && copyfiles -u 3 src/assets/images/* dist/public/images
scripts.build-js: yarn build-js:application && yarn build-js:analytics && yarn build-js:all
scripts.build-js:analytics: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts; uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/analytics/**/*.js src/assets/javascript/analytics/*.js node_modules/di-ipv-cri-common-express/src/assets/javascript/cookies.js --beautify -o dist/public/javascripts/analytics.js
scripts.build-js:all: mkdir -p dist/public/javascripts; uglifyjs node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js node_modules/hmpo-components/all.js --beautify -o dist/public/javascripts/all.js
scripts.minfiy-build-js: uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/application.js -o src/assets/javascript/application.js -c -m && uglifyjs src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -o src/assets/javascript/cookies.js -c -m
scripts.test:browser: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:8090 tcp:127.0.0.1:5020 && API_BASE_URL=http://127.0.0.1:8090 cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js -f json:./test/reports/cucumber_report.json --tags @browser
scripts.test:browser:only: wait-on tcp:8090 tcp:5020 && cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js --tags @only
scripts.test:browser:ci: npm-run-all -p -r start:ci mocks test:browser && npm run test:browser:report
scripts.test:e2e:cd:cucumber: wait-on tcp:8090 && cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js -f json:./test/reports/cucumber_report.json --tags "@e2e or @browser"
scripts.test:e2e:cd: npm-run-all -p -r mocks test:e2e:cd:cucumber && yarn run test:browser:report
scripts.test:e2e: cucumber-js test/browser/features/**/*.feature --require test/browser/support/env.js  --require test/browser/support/setup.js --require test/browser/step_definitions/**/*.js -f json:./test/reports/cucumber_report.json --tags @e2e
